title: Cleas Act
overview: If you're looking to settle into a feel-good show full of cute kids who are given a chance to shine, look no further than Cleas Act. Presenters Eibhlín Ní Chonghaile and Stiofán Ó Fearail meet children attending Gaelscoileanna and Gaeltacht-based primary schools all over Ireland. The adorable young'uns share their passions, dislikes and highly original opinions on life. Each week, one school gets to produce their own version of a major pop song as Gaelige.
